Package com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui

All general GUI components of the Scandroid application can be found within this package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InterfaceDetectorListener
    An interface that is to be implemented by classes that handle the completion of I/O interface detections.
    InterpreterHost  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothDetector  
    Detector
    A package-private helper base class to detect which I/O interfaces are available for use.
    GenericScanner
    A scan tool implementation that supports the bare minimum required by SAE-J1979 utilizing the well known and thoroughly tested ELM327 Interpreter.
    InterfaceDetector
    An asynchronous task that runs the detection routine for all registered types of I/O interfaces and forwards the result to a InterfaceDetectorListener.
    ProtocolSearch
    As mandated by SAE J1978 ยง7.1, this class provides the following functionality: Provides an "Automatic hands-off determination of the communication protocol" Informs the user that bus initialization is occurring Prevent user intervention while each individual protocol test is occurring Upon failure, advise the user of the following: That communication with the vehicle could not be established To confirm that the ignition key is in the "ON" position To check the emissions label or vehicle service information to confirm that the vehicle is OBD equipped and compliant To confirm that the external test equipment is connected to the vehicle correctly Notifies the user of the number of failed initialization attempts Retries the initialization process until succeeding or the user cancels TODO: This class has two issues: a GUI listview problem and what I feel is an ICE.
    ProtocolSearch.BusInitializationResponseListener  
    ProtocolSearch.ViewHolder  
    Scandroid
    The "Home Page" of the Scandroid application.
    Scandroid.Extras
    A static nested class to hold extras associated with this activity
    SelectInterface
    The start of the "scan tool" GUI chain.
    USBDetector  
    WifiDetector  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationMode
    The ConfigurationMode affects how many functions are available in subsequent user interfaces.
    SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode  

Package com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui Description

All general GUI components of the Scandroid application can be found within this package. It is safe to assume that any and all Scandroid specific GUI components will be located in a "sub-package" of this package.
